title: Zombie D.O.A. Series One
description: Includes Dead City, Dead On My Feet, The Dead Men and Dead On Arrival, Plus BONUS: Dead Meat (Prequel to the Series)Chris Collins is an up and coming boxer on the eve of the biggest fight of his career. Not only that, but he and his wife are expecting their firstborn any day now.Then, in an instant, all of that is snatched away and Chris is cast into a nightmare world of flesh-eating monsters, trigger-happy militias and brutal street gangs.Now Chris must travel across the zombie-infested wasteland that is post-apocalyptic America on a quest to find his newborn daughter, Ruby. In his way - hordes of ravenous zombies, cannibalistic, slave trading motorcycle gangs, crazed 'Resurrection Men' and power-hungry 'Corporation Agents.'Then there's a demented street thug, a psychotic wannabe gunslinger, a zombie super-model, and a psychopath who gets his kicks throwing people from skyscrapers, not to mention the megalomanic who plans to conquer the world at the head of a zombie army.Follow Chris Collins from the deadly streets of New York City, across the sweeping plains of the mid-west, to the zombie plagued coast of California, where he will finally encounter the man who took his daughter.But will Chris get to Ruby in time? And if he does, can he save her from what she's become?
author: J.J. Zep
